page.title: 17LIVING IN GURNARD.
page.content: The old hotel was demolished.A small block of flats for the elderly is being built.The villagers wanted a community centre and village green on the site.The sewerage goes out in to the sea.The pipe has just been made much biggger and longer. Elderly people have moved into the locality from the mainland.Some families have moved to the mainland. Young people have gone to find jobs and because they want live in a city or town. Most children are born in St.Mary's hospital.Quite a lot of families have lived on the island for hundreds of years.One of Alison's ancestors lived in Carisbrooke Castle.He was called Sir John Cutts.
